snippet.title: Party Poopers - Drinking Game
snippet.description:
Tired of playing the same old boring drinking games? Then Party Poopers is for you! A game for 2-6 players where you compete in different mini games with a built in optional drinking game. Use your favorite gamepad and if you don't have one then there is support for 4 players on the same keyboard. Perfect for getting in the right mood before a night out!

GET IT FROM:
Kartridge (Available now) https://www.kartridge.com/game/301152
Steam (Available Nov 30) https://store.steampowered.com/app/867530/Party_Poopers/
